summary: A trapper and his wife brave the harsh Yukon climate, trecherous landscape and dangerous wildlife in an attempt to live a life of solitude.
cast: Norman Winther|May Loo|Alex Van Bibber|Ken Bolton|Denny Denison|Robert Lafleur|Alain Lemaire|Christopher Lewis|Roy Ness|Kaori Torigai|Jean-Yves Chatelais|Christian Dingman|Whopper
title: El último cazador
